questions.title: I don't defecate anywhere else but in a restroom at home. I was at my friend's house and I really had to go but I couldn't. As soon as I got home, I used the restroom. What does this mean​?
should i take probiotics for my constipation?
I'm breastfeeding and have hemorrhoids - which creams are actually safe to use? My doctor said hydrocortisone is okay but I read conflicting information online.
I'm breastfeeding and have hemorrhoids - which creams are actually safe to use? My doctor said hydrocortisone is okay but I read conflicting information online.
Can hemorrhoids block my bowel movements? I feel like I need to go but nothing comes out except when I push really hard.
My thrombosed hemorrhoid looks like it's about to burst - should I pop it myself with a sterilized needle to relieve the pressure?
I only get hemorrhoids when I have diarrhea, not constipation. My doctor seems confused by this - is it unusual?
Can spicy food actually CAUSE hemorrhoids or does it just irritate existing ones? I keep seeing different answers.
I'm 28 weeks pregnant and my hemorrhoid is so painful I can't sit to breastfeed my toddler. Are there any positions that won't make it worse?
Is the bright red blood I'm seeing from hemorrhoids or could it be colon cancer? How do I tell the difference without panicking?
My hemorrhoid 'popped' and now there's a skin tag. Will this go away on its own or is it permanent?

Can I still have anal fissures even if I'm having bowel movements? I had one this morning but still feel like something is torn.
My fissure is on the side, not in the middle - does this mean I have Crohn's disease or something serious?

Will the pain from my anal fissure during sex ever go away, or should I avoid it completely until it heals?
I was told to use nitroglycerin cream for my fissure but it gives me terrible headaches. Is diltiazem really as effective?
Can anal fissures cause you to feel like you need to urinate more often? I'm peeing all the time since this started.
I'm constipated but also having diarrhea - is this possible? My doctor said I might have 'overflow diarrhea' but it doesn't make sense.
I take pain medication after surgery and now I'm so constipated I haven't gone in 5 days. How do I know if I have a bowel obstruction versus just severe constipation?
Can laxatives cause electrolyte imbalance? I've been taking them daily for months and now I'm worried about my heart.
My toddler screams and holds their poop for days because they're afraid of the pain. How do I break this cycle without traumatizing them more?
I have IBS and I'm more constipated than I have diarrhea, which my doctor says is 'unusual.' Should I be concerned that it's not typical IBS?
I read on a forum that putting a clove of raw garlic inside my rectum will cure my internal hemorrhoids overnight. It burns a little, should I keep it in?
Can I use apple cider vinegar on a cotton ball to shrink this skin tag? It stings a lot but I assume that means it's working.
I have a thrombosed hemorrhoid that looks like a purple grape. I sterilized a needle and I’m planning to pop it to let the blood out. Any tips on how to do this safely at home?
Is it okay to put a little bit of bleach in my sitz bath to kill the bacteria in my fissure? I do it for my eczema sometimes.
Can I use Vicks VapoRub on my anus? I heard the menthol shrinks the swelling.
I don't have a lump, but every time I poop it feels like I'm passing shards of broken glass. It throbs for hours afterward. Is this a hemorrhoid?
I have a painful lump near my anus, but it’s not on the hole itself, it’s like an inch away on the cheek. It feels hot and I have a low fever. Is this a external hemorrhoid?
I have bright red blood coating the stool, but absolutely zero pain. Is it possible to have a fissure that doesn't hurt?
My doctor said I have a fissure, but I feel a flap of skin hanging out. Can fissures hang out?
I just gave birth and I have stitches from a tear and giant hemorrhoids. I am terrified to poop because I don't want to rip my stitches. Can I just not eat for a few days so I don't have to go?
I'm on blood thinners (Eliquis) for a heart condition and I see blood in the toilet. Is it safe to just use Preparation H and wait it out?
I started the Keto diet and my poop is like hard rocks. It caused a hemorrhoid. Should I stop eating fat?
Can internal hemorrhoids cause lower back pain? My back is killing me.
I have a grape hanging out of my butt. I can push it in but it pops back out when I cough.
I have a worm-like piece of skin there. It doesn't hurt but it's hard to wipe clean.
It feels like I'm sitting on a ball.
